name: Heavyweight Transport Simulator 3
detailed_description:
The kings of the roads are back and carrying their heavy loads to their destination. Plan the route in advance, considering road load, bridges, width and underpasses.

Manoeuvre at walking speed over narrow roads and try to avoid damages.
Bring your loads to their destination quickly and safely.

Features:

  • Route planning
  • Bridges and underpasses
  • Revised comprehensive road system
  • New active weather system
  • Detailed new 3D landscape
  • Dozens of new freights and orders
  • New heavy-duty cranes
  • Career mode
  • Highscore mode
